oai_dc:dc.dc:title: George W. Hampton, US Colored Infantry veteran
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copyprint of George Hampton, Co. G., 16th US Colored Inf. Regt. Hampton was born in Warren Co., Ky. He mustered in at Clarksville, Tenn., February 16, 1864 and attained the rank of sergeant in October 1865. He died December 28, 1908, and is buried in Centralia, Ill. His wife Sarah was also born in Kentucky.
